name: Ehrenmann
description:
Are you a man of honor? (in german: "Ehrenmann")

A man of honor is a gentleman and lets others go first!
This already explains the gameplay, tap the screen to stop.

Enjoy 60 great levels in this new and unique minimalist platform game!

Have fun and be a man of honor!

Fun fact: "Ehrenmann" is the youth word of the year 2018 in Germany.
